overview: With Tom Dumoulin and Primož Roglič, Team Jumbo-Visma has one big goal in the summer of 2020: to win the Tour de France. For three weeks, the "yellow and black train" can be seen in front of the peloton. Everything seems to be under control. In the last week, Roglič has the leader's jersey firmly around his shoulders and apparently nothing can stand in the way of a victory march on the Champs-Élysées.
title: Code Geel
